short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Clicks Per Second (CPS) test for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Looking for a fun and interactive way to test your clicks per second skills? Look no further than our Google Chrome extension â€“ the simple CPS test game. With this extension, you can challenge yourself and your friends to see who has the quickest clicks. Our game is designed to be fast-paced and intuitive, making it easy for anyone to jump right in and start playing. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a beginner, the simple CPS test game is the perfect way to put your clicking skills to the test. So, what are you waiting for? Download the extension now and see how many clicks you can get per second!
